      • init

        public static void init(android.content.Context context,
                        java.lang.String token)
        Initiates the PlaywireSDK

        This class must be initiated within your class extending Application

        Parameters:
        context - Application class
        token - token provided by Playwire for your app, can be found in Phoenix
